skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I have experience in programming in HTML/CSS and JavaScript while utilizing the JavaScript libraries, such as React. I partaked in the Girls Who Code Immersion Program that focused on website development.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: I am knowledgable in data structures and algorithms and how they operate. I have applied this through coding in several programming languages such as C, Java, and Python.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: I have a passion for creating organized and beautiful interfaces in order to be more accessible and interactive. My main programs for designing are Figma and Canva.

skills.title: Network Security
skills.description: In high school, I enrolled in the IT Services program where I learned networking and cybersecurity. Through my time, I earned industry certifications, received awards from the NCWIT, and worked as a help desk intern.

portfolio.title: Self-Driving Robot
portfolio.description: Built a functioning robot equipped with a Raspberry Pi to capture images for the purpose of detecting incoming signs in my Robotics class.

portfolio.title: Protect Trans Lives
portfolio.description: Developed my activist website providing statistics, resources, and support about the violence towards transgender people.

portfolio.title: Snake
portfolio.description: Programmed a Snake clone where I utilized for key presses to move, store the snake's segments in an array, and checked collisions and out of bounds.
